item.title: Putin's war in Ukraine hits African nations
item.description: Russia's invasion of Ukraine has fueled a food crisis in many African nations. Experts say the African continent must supply its own sustenance. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC,Russia, Ukraine, war, Kenya, Africa, food, wheat, grain, crisis

media:content.media:title: Putin's war in Ukraine hits African nations
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,Russia, Ukraine, war, Kenya, Africa, food, wheat, grain, crisis

item.title: Could your favorite cook be replaced by a robot?
item.description: This restaurant in Croacia has a robot that can prepare dishes from scratch and in a single pot. Will real cooks soon not be needed at all?
item.keywords: DWVC,cooking, cook, food, robot, AI, restaurant, Croatia, chef, automatisation, DWDigital

media:content.media:title: Could your favorite cook be replaced by a robot?
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,cooking, cook, food, robot, AI, restaurant, Croatia, chef, automatisation, DWDigital

item.title: Quakes leave children traumatized and at risk
item.description: In the aftermath of the earthquakes in Turkey and Syria, the level of trauma suffered by survivors is enormous. Among the homeless are thousands of children. They are particularly vulnerable and urgently need help. Julia Hahn reports from Kahramanmaras.
item.keywords: DWVC,Earthquake, trauma, Turkey, Syria, mental health

media:content.media:title: Quakes leave children traumatized and at risk
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,Earthquake, trauma, Turkey, Syria, mental health

item.title: The Russian invasion of Ukraine: A year in pictures
item.description: Ukraine was invaded by Russia on February 24, 2022. A look back at the first year of war through images, while there is still no end in sight.
item.keywords: DWVC,War anniversary, 1-year Russian war, Ukraine, Russia, Bucha, Mariupol, look back, photos

media:content.media:title: The Russian invasion of Ukraine: A year in pictures
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,War anniversary, 1-year Russian war, Ukraine, Russia, Bucha, Mariupol, look back, photos

item.title: Trying to save refugees from the cold
item.description: Refugees died of hypothermia in recent years while attempting to reach European shores. NGO worker Davide Pittioni would like to provide a warm shelter for all arriving in the northern Italian city of Trieste, but theyâ€™re out of space.

media:content.media:title: Trying to save refugees from the cold

item.title: Ukraine calls for Olympics ban on Russia and Belarus
item.description: "How can we stand next to our murderers on a podium?" Ukraine is on a mission to get Russian and Belarusian athletes banned from the 2024 Paris Olympics.
item.keywords: DWVC,IOC, Olympics, Russia, Ukraine, sports, athletes, Olympic Games

media:content.media:title: Ukraine calls for Olympics ban on Russia and Belarus

item.title: Transparent solar cells turn light into electricity
item.description: Dye-sensitised solar cells can now absorb light across the entire spectrum of visible light.

item.title: Meta announces paid verification
item.description: Meta has announced you will soon be able to buy verification for both Facebook and Instagram. Unlike Twitter, they will require government ID to improve their security and authenticity though it will also be more expensive.
item.keywords: DWVC,DWdigital, Meta, Facebook, Instagram, technology, Social Media, Verification

media:content.media:title: Meta announces paid verification
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,DWdigital, Meta, Facebook, Instagram, technology, Social Media, Verification

item.title: How NATO polices the skies on Russia's border
item.description: NATO polices the skies on Russia's border from the Amari airbase in Estonia. The mission is to protect the air space and identify unknown and potentially hostile aircraft.
item.keywords: DWVC,NATO, Russia, war, Urkaine, jets, pilots, air policing

media:content.media:title: How NATO polices the skies on Russia's border
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,NATO, Russia, war, Urkaine, jets, pilots, air policing

item.title: Earthquake survivors search mass graves for loved ones
item.description: Earthquake survivors are coming to these mass graves in Turkey in search of their loved ones. Workers and volunteers carry out a burial ritual on site when relatives are not present to do it themselves.
item.keywords: DWVC,Earthquake, Turkey, mass graves, burial, survivors

media:content.media:title: Earthquake survivors search mass graves for loved ones
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,Earthquake, Turkey, mass graves, burial, survivors
